definition: being the only one, one who lives in solitude
details:
adjective
- being the only one
= synonyms: sole
- devoid of creatures
= synonyms: lonely
- characterized by or preferring solitude
= synonyms: lone, lonely
- lacking companions or companionship
= synonyms: alone
- of plants and animals
= synonyms: nongregarious, nonsocial
noun
- one who lives in solitude
= synonyms: recluse, hermit, solitudinarian
- confinement of a prisoner in isolation from other prisoners
= example: confinement of a prisoner in isolation from other prisoners
= synonyms: solitary confinement
